channel.title: Changing teleport spells?
channel.description: How do I change the teleport spell names and locations?

item.title: Changing teleport spells?
item.dc:creator: @mod_damo mod damo
item.description:
@mod_damo wrote:

[quote=“Lanthus20, post:3, topic:335452”]all i found is stuff about prayer and dueling. Btw i am using combattscape source (317)

and I can’t just search a coordinate because it places you randomly.[/quote]

Fuck! If you like, use the server i release in downloads.
Very good base to use.

item.title: Changing teleport spells?
item.dc:creator: @mod_damo mod damo
item.description:
@mod_damo wrote:

like this,

changeText126("Home Teleport", 1300); changeText126("Teleport Home", 1301); changeText126("Pking Teleport", 1325); changeText126("Fight Players Here", 1326); changeText126("Training Teleport", 1350); changeText126("Become Powerfull Today", 1351); changeText126("Skilling Teleport", 1382); changeText126("Train Non-Combat Skills Here", 1383); changeText126("Monster Teleport", 1415); changeText126("Battle Different Monsters", 1416); changeText126("MiniGames Teleport", 1454); changeText126("Try Out MiniGames", 1455); changeText126("Games Teleport", 7457); changeText126("Visit The Games", 7458); changeText126("Bosses Teleport", 18472); changeText126("Be Prepared Before Teleporting!", 18473); changeText126("Home Teleport", 13037); changeText126("Teleport Home", 13038); changeText126("Pking Teleport", 13047); changeText126("Fight Players Here", 13048); changeText126("Training Teleport", 13055); changeText126("Become Powerfull Today", 13056); changeText126("Skilling Teleport", 13063); changeText126("Train Non-Combat Skills Here", 13064); changeText126("Monster Teleport", 13071); changeText126("Battle Different Monsters", 13072); changeText126("MiniGames Teleport", 13081); changeText126("Try Out MiniGames", 13082); changeText126("Games Teleport", 13089); changeText126("Visit The Games", 13090); changeText126("Bosses Teleport", 13097); changeText126("Be Prepared Before Teleporting!", 13098);

Change the “changeText126” to your server might be “sendQuest126”
To change the locations. It should be in your actionbuttons() or clickingmost.java

Read full topic
